opening_theme: "Sorairo no Tsubasa (ソラ色のつばさ)" by Ryoko Shiraishi
ending_theme: #2: "Kirakira ~Shikimi ver.~ (きらきら 〜Shikimi ver.〜)" by Aya Hirano (eps 2, 9, 12)
#3: "Kirakira ~Himawari ver.~ (きらきら 〜Himawari ver.〜)" by Kana Matsumoto (eps 3, 6, 10)
#4: "Kirakira ~Himeji ver.~ (きらきら 〜Himeji ver.〜)" by Mayumi Yoshida (ep 4)
#5: "Kirakira ~Azami ver.~ (きらきら 〜Azami ver.〜)" by Ryoko Shiraishi (eps 5, 11)
#6: "Kirakira ~Yusura ver.~ (きらきら 〜Yusura ver.〜)" by Asumi Nakada (ep 7)
